Container.Name: research-dashboard
Container.Overview: A web dashboard for managing Claude Code research jobs. Submit research queries, watch Claude work in real time via SSE streaming, and browse generated reports with cited sources. Requires an Anthropic API key.
Container.Requires: An Anthropic API key is required. Get one at https://console.anthropic.com/

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Port for the research dashboard web interface.

Config.Name: Research Data
Config.Description: Directory where research output is stored.

Config.Name: Claude Config
Config.Description: (Optional) Path to your .claude config directory for OAuth authentication. Leave empty to use API key instead.

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: Your Anthropic API key (starts with sk-ant-). Required unless using OAuth via the Claude Config mount.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions. Default 99 is the Unraid nobody user.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions. Default 100 is the Unraid users group.
